void TestDiscardMultipleConnections ()
 At the moment, we do not support multiple connections, so after an initial client connection, every connection attempt after that should fail. The initial connection should still work after that.

 Tests whether connecting to an inexistent host correctly fails.

At the moment, we do not support multiple connections, so after an initial client connection, every connection attempt after that should fail. The initial connection should still work after that.
